Title: formatReadableSize
Description: Given a size (number of bytes), this function returns a readable, rounded size with suffix (KiB, MiB, etc.) as string.
The opposite operations of this function are parseReadableSize, parseReadableSizeOrZero, and parseReadableSizeOrNull.
Examples: SELECT    arrayJoin([1, 1024, 1024*1024, 192851925]) AS filesize_bytes,    formatReadableSize(filesize_bytes) AS filesize
